title: Adding and Subtracting Matrices
body: For the following exercises, use the matrices below and perform the matrix addition or subtraction. $$A=\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 3 \\ 0 & 7 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$B=\begin{bmatrix} 2 & 14 \\ 22 & 6 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$C=\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 5 \\ 8 & 92 \\ 12 & 6 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$D=\begin{bmatrix} 10 & 14 \\ 7 & 2 \\ 5 & 61 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$E=\begin{bmatrix} 6 & 12 \\ 14 & 5 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$F=\begin{bmatrix} 0 & 9 \\ 78 & 17 \\ 15 & 4 \end{bmatrix}$$
